question: Question_03_(d)
statement:
Let

\[S = \left\{[x_1, x_2, x_3]^T:\, x_1 + x_2 + x_3 = 0\right\}\]

be the subspace of vectors in $\mathbb R^3$ whose components sum to
zero.

\textbf{(d)} Write down the MATLAB/Octave code that

(i) computes the projection matrix \emph{P} that projects onto \emph{S}
and

(ii) computes the vector in \emph{S} that is closest to \emph{{[}0, 1,
0{]}\textsuperscript{T}}.
